context: The word 'uskuma' is an Estonian verb meaning to believe or trust. It's the infinitive form of the verb. The stem 'usku-' relates to belief, trust, or faith, and '-ma' is the infinitive suffix in Estonian. This verb can be used when expressing belief in something, trusting someone, or having faith in an idea or person.
